title: Unable to log on
body:
I can pass the authentication but it keeps "logging on" for about a minute and says "Connection failure". Everything mentioned the support site has been checked. {{summoner:13}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{summoner:13}} 

Can somebody tell me what is going on and how I can solve this? Or is it possible that some riot people can help me diagnose and fix this problem? Thanks.

replies.body: I don't currently see any issues with the login servers, are you still having this issue?  If so then your network could be have trouble reaching our authentication server.  Go over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings to allow access.  Let me know if you have any questions about that!

Thanks for letting me know about this.

But it seems none of the settings is wrong. I tried hextech repair tool as well. It gives "completed task", but I am still not able to log on.

Still the very same condition: 
patcher good
download and update good
authentication good

logging on
logging on
logging on

connection failure...

Is there anything else I can do?

Thanks for the update!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help out.  The HRT should have also provided some logs which you can attach to your ticket to give us more context.  We'll respond asap!
is been 5 days i'm unable to long in 10 Tickets No answers NO SOLUTIONS .....
